   20: 
   21: -module(tftp_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   26: %% Includes and defines
   27: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include("tftp_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: -define(START_DAEMON(Port, Options),
   33:         begin
   34:             {ok, Pid} = ?VERIFY({ok, _Pid}, tftp:start([{port, Port} | Options])),
   35:             if
   36:                 Port == 0 ->
   37:                     {ok, ActualOptions} = ?IGNORE(tftp:info(Pid)),
   38:                     {value, {port, ActualPort}} =
   39:                         lists:keysearch(port, 1, ActualOptions),
   40:                     {ActualPort, Pid};
   41:                 true ->
   42:                     {Port, Pid}
   43:             end
   44:         end).
   45: 
   46: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   47: %% API
   48: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   49: 
   50: t() -> 
   51:     tftp_test_lib:t([{?MODULE, all}]).
   52: 
   53: t(Cases) ->
   54:     tftp_test_lib:t(Cases, default_config()).
   55: 
   56: t(Cases, Config) ->
   57:     tftp_test_lib:t(Cases, Config).
   58: 
   59: default_config() ->
   60:     [].
   61: 
   62: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   63: %% Test server callbacks
   64: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   65: 
   66: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   67:     tftp_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   68: 
   69: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   70:     tftp_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   71: 
   72: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   73: %% Top test case
   74: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   75: 
   76: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   77: 
   78: all() ->
   79:     [
   80:      simple,
   81:      extra,
   82:      reuse_connection,
   83:      resend_client,
   84:      resend_server,
   85:      large_file,
   86:      app,
   87:      appup
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [].
   92: 
   93: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   94:     Config.
   95: 
   96: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  103:     Config.
  104: 
  105: 
  106: app() ->
  107:     [{doc, "Test that the tftp app file is ok"}].
  108: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  109:     ok = test_server:app_test(tftp).
  110: 
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: appup() ->
  113:     [{doc, "Test that the tftp appup file is ok"}].
  114: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     ok = test_server:appup_test(tftp).
  116: 
  117: 
  118: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  119: %% Simple
  120: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  121: 
  122: simple(doc) ->
  123:     ["Start the daemon and perform simple a read and write."];
  124: simple(suite) ->
  125:     [];
  126: simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(tftp)),
  128: 
  129:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  130: 
  131:     %% Read fail
  132:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_temporary_remote_test_file.txt",
  133:     LocalFilename = "tftp_temporary_local_test_file.txt",
  134:     Blob = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(2000, $1)),
  135:     %% Blob = <<"Some file contents\n">>,
  136:     Size = size(Blob),
  137:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  138:     ?VERIFY({error, {client_open, enoent, _}},
  139:             tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, [{port, Port}])),
  140:     
  141:     %% Write and read
  142:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob, [{port, Port}])),
  143:     ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, [{port, Port}])),
  144:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  145:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  146: 
  147:     %% Cleanup
  148:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  149:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  150:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  151:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  152:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(tftp)),
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  156: %% Extra
  157: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  158: 
  159: extra(doc) ->
  160:     ["Verify new stuff for IS 1.2."];
  161: extra(suite) ->
  162:     [];
  163: extra(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     ?VERIFY({'EXIT', {badarg,{fake_key, fake_flag}}},
  165:             tftp:start([{port, 0}, {fake_key, fake_flag}])),
  166: 
  167:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  168:     
  169:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_extra_temporary_remote_test_file.txt",
  170:     LocalFilename = "tftp_extra_temporary_local_test_file.txt",
  171:     Blob = <<"Some file contents\n">>,
  172:     Size = size(Blob),
  173:     Host = "127.0.0.1",
  174:     Peer = {inet, Host, Port},
  175:     Generic =
  176:         [
  177:          {state,   []},
  178:          {prepare, fun extra_prepare/6},
  179:          {open,    fun extra_open/6},
  180:          {read,    fun extra_read/1},
  181:          {write,   fun extra_write/2},
  182:          {abort,   fun extra_abort/3 }
  183:         ],
  184:     Options = [{host, Host},
  185:                {port, Port},
  186:                %%{ debug,all},
  187:                {callback, {".*", tftp_test_lib, Generic}}],
  188:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(LocalFilename, Blob)),
  189:     ?VERIFY({ok, [{count, Size}, Peer]},
  190:             tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, Options)),
  191:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  192:     
  193:     ?VERIFY({ok,[{bin, Blob}, Peer]}, 
  194:             tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, Options)),
  195: 
  196:     %% Cleanup
  197:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  198:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  199:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  200:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  201:     ok.
  202: 
  203: -record(extra_state,  {file, blksize, count, acc, peer}).
  204: 
  205: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  206: %% Prepare
  207: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: 
  209: extra_prepare(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) ->
  210:     %% Client side
  211:     BlkSize = list_to_integer(tftp_test_lib:lookup_option("blksize", "512", SuggestedOptions)),
  212:     State = #extra_state{blksize = BlkSize, peer = Peer},
  213:     extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, State),
  214:     {ok, SuggestedOptions, State};
  215: extra_prepare(_Peer, _Access, _Bin, _Mode, _SuggestedOptions, _Initial) ->
  216:     {error, {undef, "Illegal callback options."}}.
  217: 
  218: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  219: %% Open
  220: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  221: 
  222: extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) ->
  223:     %% Server side
  224:     case extra_prepare(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, SuggestedOptions, []) of
  225:         {ok, AcceptedOptions, []} ->
  226:             BlkSize = list_to_integer(tftp_test_lib:lookup_option("blksize", "512", AcceptedOptions)),
  227:             State = #extra_state{blksize = BlkSize, peer = Peer},
  228:             extra_open(Peer, Access, LocalFilename, Mode, AcceptedOptions, State);
  229:         {error, {Code, Text}} ->
  230:             {error, {Code, Text}}
  231:     end;
  232: extra_open(_Peer, Access, LocalFilename, _Mode, NegotiatedOptions, #extra_state{} = State) ->
  233:     {File, Acc} =
  234:         case Access of
  235:             read ->
  236:                 if
  237:                     is_binary(LocalFilename) ->
  238:                         {undefined, LocalFilename};
  239:                     is_list(LocalFilename) ->
  240:                         {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(LocalFilename),
  241:                         {LocalFilename, Bin}
  242:             end;
  243:             write -> 
  244:                 {LocalFilename, []}
  245:         end,
  246:     %% Both sides
  247:     State2 = State#extra_state{file = File, acc = Acc, count = 0},
  248:     {ok, NegotiatedOptions, State2}.
  249: 
  250: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  251: %% Read
  252: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  253: 
  254: extra_read(#extra_state{acc = Bin} = State) when is_binary(Bin) ->
  255:     BlkSize = State#extra_state.blksize,
  256:     Count = State#extra_state.count + size(Bin),
  257:     if
  258:         size(Bin) >= BlkSize ->
  259:             <<Block:BlkSize/binary, Bin2/binary>> = Bin,
  260:             State2 = State#extra_state{acc = Bin2, count = Count},
  261:             {more, Block, State2};
  262:         size(Bin) < BlkSize ->
  263:             Res = [{count, Count}, State#extra_state.peer],
  264:             {last, Bin, Res}
  265:     end.
  266: 
  267: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  268: %% Write
  269: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  270: 
  271: extra_write(Bin, #extra_state{acc = List} = State) when is_binary(Bin), is_list(List) ->
  272:     Size = size(Bin),
  273:     BlkSize = State#extra_state.blksize,
  274:     if
  275:         Size == BlkSize ->
  276:             {more, State#extra_state{acc = [Bin | List]}};
  277:         Size < BlkSize ->
  278:             Bin2 = list_to_binary(lists:reverse([Bin | List])),
  279:             Res = [{bin,  Bin2}, State#extra_state.peer],
  280:             file:write_file(State#extra_state.file, Bin2),
  281:             {last, Res}
  282:     end.
  283: 
  284: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  285: %% Abort
  286: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  287: 
  288: extra_abort(_Code, _Text, #extra_state{}) ->
  289:     ok.
  290: 
  291: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  292: %% Re-send client
  293: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  294: 
  295: resend_client(doc) ->
  296:     ["Verify that the server behaves correctly when the client re-sends packets."];
  297: resend_client(suite) ->
  298:     [];
  299: resend_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  300:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  301:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, all}])),
  302: 
  303:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 10)),
  304:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 512)),
  305:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_client(Host, Port, 1025)),
  306: 
  307:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 10)),
  308:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 512)),
  309:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_client(Host, Port, 1025)),
  310:     
  311:     %% Cleanup
  312:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  313:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  314:     ok.
  315: 
  316: resend_read_client(Host, Port, BlkSize) ->
  317:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_read_client.tmp",
  318:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  319:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  320:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  321:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  322:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  323:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5],
  324:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  325:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob)),
  326: 
  327:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  328:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  329: 
  330:     %% Open socket
  331:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  332: 
  333:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  334:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  335:     NewPort =
  336:         if
  337:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  338:                 %% Send READ
  339:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary(ReadList),
  340:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  341: 
  342:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  343:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  344: 
  345:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  346:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  347:                 NewPort0;
  348:             true ->
  349:                 %% Send READ
  350:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  351:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  352:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  353:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  354: 
  355:                 %% Recv OACK
  356:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6 | Options]),
  357:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  358: 
  359:                 %% Send ACK #0
  360:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  361:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  362: 
  363:                 %% Send ACK #0 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  364:                 timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  365:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  366: 
  367:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  368:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  369:                 NewPort0
  370:         end,
  371: 
  372:     %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  373:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  374: 
  375:     %% Send ACK #1
  376:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  377:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin)),
  378: 
  379:     %% Recv DATA #2
  380:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  381:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  382: 
  383:     %% Send ACK #2
  384:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  385:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  386: 
  387:     %% Recv DATA #3
  388:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  389:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  390: 
  391:     %% Send ACK #3
  392:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  393:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin)),
  394: 
  395:     %% Send ACK #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  396:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  397:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin)),
  398: 
  399:     %% Recv DATA #4 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  400:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  401:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  402: 
  403:     %% Recv DATA #4 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  404:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  405: 
  406:     %% Send ACK #2 which is out of range
  407:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  408: 
  409:     %% Send ACK #4
  410:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  411:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack4Bin)),
  412: 
  413:     %% Recv DATA #5
  414:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  415:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  416: 
  417:     %% Send ACK #5
  418:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  419:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack5Bin)),
  420: 
  421:     %% Close socket
  422:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  423: 
  424:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  425:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  426:     ok.
  427: 
  428: resend_write_client(Host, Port, BlkSize) ->
  429:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_write_client.tmp",
  430:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  431:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  432:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  433:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  434:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  435:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5],
  436:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  437:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  438:     ?VERIFY({error, enoent}, file:read_file(RemoteFilename)),
  439: 
  440:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  441:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  442: 
  443:     %% Open socket
  444:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  445: 
  446:     WriteList = [0, 2, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  447:     NewPort =
  448:         if
  449:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  450:                 %% Send WRITE
  451:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary(WriteList),
  452:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, WriteBin)),
  453: 
  454:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  455:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  456: 
  457:                 %% Recv ACK #0 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  458:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  459:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  460: 
  461:                 %% Recv ACK #0  AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  462:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  463:                 NewPort0;
  464:             true ->
  465:                 %% Send WRITE
  466:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  467:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary([WriteList, "blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  468:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, WriteBin)),
  469: 
  470:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the server to re-send the packet
  471:                 timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  472: 
  473:                 %% Recv OACK (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  474:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  475:                 ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  476:                 
  477:                 %% Recv OACK AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  478:                 {udp, _, _, NewPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  479:                 NewPort0
  480:         end,
  481: 
  482:     %% Send DATA #1
  483:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  484:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin)),
  485: 
  486:     %% Recv ACK #1 
  487:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  488:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  489: 
  490:     %% Send DATA #2
  491:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  492:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin)),
  493: 
  494:     %% Recv ACK #2
  495:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  496:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  497: 
  498:     %% Send DATA #3
  499:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  500:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin)),
  501: 
  502:     %% Recv ACK #3
  503:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  504:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  505: 
  506:     %% Send DATA #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  507:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  508:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data3Bin)),
  509: 
  510:     %% Recv ACK #3 AGAIN (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  511:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  512: 
  513:     %% Send DATA #2 which is out of range
  514:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin)),
  515: 
  516:     %% Send DATA #4
  517:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  518:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data4Bin)),
  519: 
  520:     %% Recv ACK #4
  521:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  522:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  523: 
  524:     %% Send DATA #5
  525:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  526:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Data5Bin)),
  527: 
  528:     %% Recv ACK #5
  529:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  530:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  531: 
  532:     %% Close socket
  533:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  534: 
  535:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  536:     ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, file:read_file(RemoteFilename)),
  537:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  541: %% Re-send server
  542: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  543: 
  544: resend_server(doc) ->
  545:     ["Verify that the server behaves correctly when the server re-sends packets."];
  546: resend_server(suite) ->
  547:     [];
  548: resend_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  549:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  550: 
  551:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 10)),
  552:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 512)),
  553:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_read_server(Host, 1025)),
  554:     
  555:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 10)),
  556:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 512)),
  557:     ?VERIFY(ok, resend_write_server(Host, 1025)),
  558:     ok.
  559: 
  560: resend_read_server(Host, BlkSize) ->
  561:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_read_server.tmp",
  562:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  563:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  564:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  565:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  566:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  567:     Block6 = [],
  568:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5, Block6],
  569:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  570: 
  571:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  572:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  573: 
  574:     %% Open daemon socket
  575:     {ok, DaemonSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  576:     {ok, DaemonPort} = ?IGNORE(inet:port(DaemonSocket)),
  577: 
  578:     %% Open server socket
  579:     {ok, ServerSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  580:     ?IGNORE(inet:port(ServerSocket)),
  581: 
  582:     %% Prepare client process
  583:     ReplyTo = self(),
  584:     ClientFun =
  585:         fun(Extra) ->
  586:                 Options = [{port, DaemonPort}, {debug, brief}] ++ Extra,
  587:                 Res = ?VERIFY({ok, Blob}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, binary, Options)),
  588:                 ReplyTo ! {self(), {tftp_client_reply, Res}},
  589:                 exit(normal)
  590:         end,
  591: 
  592:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  593:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  594:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  595:     {ClientPort, ClientPid} =
  596:         if
  597:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  598:                 %% Start client process
  599:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([]) end),
  600: 
  601:                 %% Recv READ
  602:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary(ReadList),
  603:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, ReadBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  604: 
  605:                 %% Send DATA #1
  606:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin)),
  607: 
  608:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  609:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  610: 
  611:                 %% Recv ACK #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  612:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  613: 
  614:                 %% Recv ACK #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  615:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  616:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0};
  617:             true ->
  618:                 %% Start client process
  619:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  620:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([{"blksize", BlkSizeList}]) end),
  621:                 
  622:                 %% Recv READ
  623:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  624:                 ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  625:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, ReadBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  626: 
  627:                 %% Send OACK
  628:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  629:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  630:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, OptionAckBin)),
  631: 
  632:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  633:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  634: 
  635:                 %% Recv ACK #0 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  636:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  637:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  638: 
  639:                 %% Recv ACK #0 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  640:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  641: 
  642:                 %% Send DATA #1
  643:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin)),
  644: 
  645:                 %% Recv ACK #1
  646:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Ack1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  647:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0}
  648:         end,
  649: 
  650:     %% Send DATA #2
  651:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  652:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data2Bin)),
  653: 
  654:     %% Recv ACK #2
  655:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  656:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  657: 
  658:     %% Send DATA #3
  659:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  660:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  661: 
  662:     %% Recv ACK #3
  663:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  664:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  665: 
  666:     %% Send DATA #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  667:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  668:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  669: 
  670:     %% Recv ACK #3 AGAIN (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  671:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  672: 
  673:     %% Send DATA #4
  674:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  675:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin)),
  676: 
  677:     %% Recv ACK #4
  678:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  679:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  680: 
  681:     %% Send DATA #3 which is out of range
  682:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin)),
  683: 
  684:     %% Send DATA #5
  685:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  686:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data5Bin)),
  687: 
  688:     %% Recv ACK #5
  689:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  690:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  691: 
  692:     %% Send DATA #6
  693:     Data6Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 6 | Block6]),
  694:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data6Bin)),
  695: 
  696:     %% Close daemon and server sockets
  697:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(ServerSocket)),
  698:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(DaemonSocket)),
  699: 
  700:     ?VERIFY({ClientPid, {tftp_client_reply, {ok, Blob}}}, recv(Timeout)),
  701: 
  702:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  703:     ok.
  704: 
  705: resend_write_server(Host, BlkSize) ->
  706:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_resend_write_server.tmp",
  707:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  708:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $2),
  709:     Block3 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $3),
  710:     Block4 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $4),
  711:     Block5 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $5),
  712:     Block6 = [],
  713:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2, Block3, Block4, Block5, Block6],
  714:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  715:     Size = size(Blob),
  716: 
  717:     Timeout = timer:seconds(3),
  718:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  719: 
  720:     %% Open daemon socket
  721:     {ok, DaemonSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  722:     {ok, DaemonPort} = ?IGNORE(inet:port(DaemonSocket)),
  723: 
  724:     %% Open server socket
  725:     {ok, ServerSocket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  726:     ?IGNORE(inet:port(ServerSocket)),
  727: 
  728:     %% Prepare client process
  729:     ReplyTo = self(),
  730:     ClientFun =
  731:         fun(Extra) ->
  732:                 Options = [{port, DaemonPort}, {debug, brief}] ++ Extra,
  733:                 Res = ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob, Options)),
  734:                 ReplyTo ! {self(), {tftp_client_reply, Res}},
  735:                 exit(normal)
  736:         end,
  737: 
  738:     WriteList = [0, 2, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  739:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  740:     {ClientPort, ClientPid} =
  741:         if
  742:             BlkSize =:= 512 ->
  743:                 %% Start client process
  744:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([]) end),
  745: 
  746:                 %% Recv WRITE
  747:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary(WriteList),
  748:                 io:format("WriteBin ~p\n", [WriteBin]),
  749:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, WriteBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  750: 
  751:                 %% Send ACK #1
  752:                 Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  753:                 ?VERIFY(ok,  gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Ack0Bin)),
  754: 
  755:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  756:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  757: 
  758:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  759:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  760: 
  761:                 %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  762:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, _, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  763:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0};
  764:             true ->
  765:                 %% Start client process
  766:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  767:                 ClientPid0 = spawn_link(fun() -> ClientFun([{"blksize", BlkSizeList}]) end),
  768:                 
  769:                 %% Recv WRITE
  770:                 Options = ["blksize", 0, BlkSizeList, 0],
  771:                 WriteBin = list_to_binary([WriteList | Options]),
  772:                 {udp, _, _, ClientPort0, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, DaemonSocket, Host, _, WriteBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  773: 
  774:                 %% Send OACK
  775:                 BlkSizeList = integer_to_list(BlkSize),
  776:                 OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6, "blksize",0, BlkSizeList, 0]),
  777:                 ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, OptionAckBin)),
  778: 
  779:                 %% Sleep a while in order to provoke the client to re-send the packet
  780:                 timer:sleep(Timeout + timer:seconds(1)),
  781: 
  782:                 %% Recv DATA #1 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  783:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  784: 
  785:                 %% Recv DATA #1 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  786:                 ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort0, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  787:                 {ClientPort0, ClientPid0}
  788:         end,
  789: 
  790:     %% Send ACK #1
  791:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  792:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack1Bin)),
  793: 
  794:     %% Recv DATA #2
  795:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  796:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  797: 
  798:     %% Send ACK #2
  799:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  800:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack2Bin)),
  801: 
  802:     %% Recv DATA #3
  803:     Data3Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 3 | Block3]),
  804:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data3Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  805: 
  806:     %% Send ACK #3
  807:     Ack3Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 3>>,
  808:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  809: 
  810:     %% Send ACK #3 AGAIN (pretend that we timed out)
  811:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  812:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  813: 
  814:     %% Recv DATA #4 (the packet that the server think that we have lost)
  815:     Data4Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 4 | Block4]),
  816:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  817: 
  818:     %% Recv DATA #4 AGAIN (the re-sent package)
  819:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data4Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  820: 
  821:     %% Send ACK #4
  822:     Ack4Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 4>>,
  823:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack4Bin)),
  824: 
  825:     %% Recv DATA #5
  826:     Data5Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 5 | Block5]),
  827:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data5Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  828: 
  829:     %% Send ACK #3 which is out of range
  830:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack3Bin)),
  831: 
  832:     %% Send ACK #5
  833:     Ack5Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 5>>,
  834:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack5Bin)),
  835: 
  836:     %% Recv DATA #6
  837:     Data6Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 6 | Block6]),
  838:     ?VERIFY({udp, ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Data6Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  839: 
  840:     %% Send ACK #6
  841:     Ack6Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 6>>,
  842:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(ServerSocket, Host, ClientPort, Ack6Bin)),
  843: 
  844:     %% Close daemon and server sockets
  845:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(ServerSocket)),
  846:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(DaemonSocket)),
  847: 
  848:     ?VERIFY({ClientPid, {tftp_client_reply, {ok, Size}}}, recv(Timeout)),
  849: 
  850:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  851:     ok.
  852: 
  853: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  854: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  855: 
  856: reuse_connection(doc) ->
  857:     ["Verify that the server can reuse an ongiong connection when same client resends request."];
  858: reuse_connection(suite) ->
  859:     [];
  860: reuse_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  861:     Host = {127, 0, 0, 1},
  862:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, all}])),
  863: 
  864:     RemoteFilename = "reuse_connection.tmp",
  865:     BlkSize = 512,
  866:     Block1 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize, $1),
  867:     Block2 = lists:duplicate(BlkSize div 2, $2),
  868:     Blocks = [Block1, Block2],
  869:     Blob = list_to_binary(Blocks),
  870:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:write_file(RemoteFilename, Blob)),
  871:     
  872:     Seconds = 3,
  873:     Timeout = timer:seconds(Seconds),
  874:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(0)),
  875:     
  876:     %% Open socket
  877:     {ok, Socket} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, gen_udp:open(0, [binary, {reuseaddr, true}, {active, true}])),
  878:     
  879:     ReadList = [0, 1, RemoteFilename, 0, "octet", 0],
  880:     Data1Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 1 | Block1]),
  881:     
  882:     %% Send READ
  883:     TimeoutList = integer_to_list(Seconds),
  884:     Options = ["timeout", 0, TimeoutList, 0],
  885:     ReadBin = list_to_binary([ReadList | Options]),
  886:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  887: 
  888:     %% Send yet another READ for same file
  889:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, Port, ReadBin)),
  890: 
  891:     %% Recv OACK
  892:     OptionAckBin = list_to_binary([0, 6 | Options]),
  893:     {udp, _, _, NewPort, _} = ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, _, OptionAckBin}, recv(Timeout)),
  894: 
  895:     %% Send ACK #0
  896:     Ack0Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 0>>,
  897:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack0Bin)),
  898: 
  899:     %% Recv DATA #1
  900:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data1Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  901: 
  902:     %% Send ACK #1
  903:     Ack1Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 1>>,
  904:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack1Bin)),
  905: 
  906:     %% Recv DATA #2
  907:     Data2Bin = list_to_binary([0, 3, 0, 2 | Block2]),
  908:     ?VERIFY({udp, Socket, Host, NewPort, Data2Bin}, recv(Timeout)),
  909: 
  910:     %% Send ACK #2
  911:     Ack2Bin = <<0, 4, 0, 2>>,
  912:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:send(Socket, Host, NewPort, Ack2Bin)),
  913: 
  914:     %% Close socket
  915:     ?VERIFY(ok, gen_udp:close(Socket)),
  916: 
  917:     ?VERIFY(timeout, recv(Timeout)),
  918:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  919: 
  920:     %% Cleanup
  921:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  922:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  923:     ok.
  924: 
  925: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  926: %% Large file: transfer > 65535 blocks
  927: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  928: 
  929: large_file(doc) ->
  930:     ["Start the daemon and test transfer of files greater than 32M."];
  931: large_file(suite) ->
  932:     [];
  933: large_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  934:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(tftp)),
  935: 
  936:     {Port, DaemonPid} = ?IGNORE(?START_DAEMON(0, [{debug, brief}])),
  937: 
  938:     %% Read fail
  939:     RemoteFilename = "tftp_temporary_large_file_remote_test_file.txt",
  940:     LocalFilename = "tftp_temporary_large_file_local_test_file.txt",
  941: 
  942:     {ok, FH} = file:open(LocalFilename, [write,exclusive]),
  943:     {ok, Size} = file:position(FH, {eof, 2*512*65535}),
  944:     ok = file:truncate(FH),
  945:     ?IGNORE(file:close(FH)),
  946: 
  947:     %% Write and read
  948:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:write_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  949:     ?IGNORE(file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  950:     ?VERIFY({ok, Size}, tftp:read_file(RemoteFilename, LocalFilename, [{port, Port}])),
  951: 
  952:     %% Cleanup
  953:     unlink(DaemonPid),
  954:     exit(DaemonPid, kill),
  955:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(LocalFilename)),
  956:     ?VERIFY(ok, file:delete(RemoteFilename)),
  957:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(tftp)),
  958:     ok.
  959: 
  960: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  961: %% Goodies
  962: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  963: 
  964: recv(Timeout) ->
  965:     receive
  966:         Msg ->
  967:             Msg
  968:     after Timeout ->
  969:             timeout
  970:     end.
